revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Decoration | name = Wooden barrel | class = ZBarrel | game = Hexen | doomednum = 8100 }}[[Classes]]: ZBarrel
A wooden barrel from Hexen, slightly less massive-looking than Heretic's own [[Classes:Barrel|wooden barrel]]. In Hexen.wad, the sprite is actually named BARLA0 and is [[Sprite renaming|renamed at load-time]] by ZDoom. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR ZBarrel { {{Property|Radius}} 15 {{Property|Height}} 32 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: ZBAR A -1 Stop } }
